articles.title: Faster feedback: Comment-only links + comment metadata | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Share a link so stakeholders can quickly comment without an account, plus each parent comment includes important context like operating system, browser, and screen size.

articles.title: Introducing Webflow App Gen | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Webflow App Gen makes it easy to turn prompts into production-grade web apps that stay on brand, connect to your CMS, and deploy to Webflow Cloud.

articles.title: Audit and improve SEO & AEO with Webflow AI | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Stay discoverable as search evolves with AI-powered tools that improve SEO and AEO across your entire site.

articles.title: CMS API | Webflow Updates
articles.description: The Webflow CMS REST API is open for business! Now you can add, update, and delete Items from Collections programmatically, right from your terminal.

articles.title: New in-product navigation  | Webflow Updates
articles.description: We are updating our in-product navigation to streamline collaboration and productivity as Webflow's product continues to evolve.

articles.title: Introducing our new Help Center for Enhanced Support  | Webflow Updates
articles.description: We’re excited to share our new Help Center in Webflow to help you understand how a feature works, troubleshoot an issue, or contact our support team.

articles.title: Advanced variables with functions | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Define dynamic design values in Webflow using CSS functions like clamp(), calc(), min(), max(), and color-mix(). Function variables make it easier to create flexible, reusable styles for modern, scalable websites.

articles.title: Drop shadow filters | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Add depth and dimension to designs using the drop-shadow() CSS function, now available as an effect in the Style panel.

articles.title: Publish and unpublish multiple CMS items at once | Webflow Updates
articles.description: To provide more flexibility with publishing options and reduce the need for full-site publishes, we’ve introduced new controls for bulk publishing.

articles.title: Page branching | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Now you can have multiple designers working in parallel on different pages with page branching.

articles.title: CSS filters | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Create beautiful effects by adding one or more of 8 CSS filters to any element of your Webflow websites inside the Designer.

articles.title: Increased scale for ecommerce site plans | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Thanks to our investments in scaling our CMS earlier this year, we’re increasing ecommerce and CMS item limits across Ecommerce Plus and Advanced plans.

articles.title: Nest Collection pages within folders for more URL control — plus more | Webflow Updates
articles.description: We’ve added a handful of quality of life improvements to the CMS that let you finely tune your website’s SEO profile and build out your content library faster.

articles.title: Search across sites, Workspaces, and settings with dashboard quick find | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Navigate Webflow faster than ever with the new quick find shortcut. Instantly search across sites, Workspaces, and settings — plus, assign custom names to client Workspaces for a simpler search experience.

articles.title: Object-fit support | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Now you can use the object-fit property to control how images resize within parent elements, giving you a more accessible alternative to background images.

articles.title: Introducing the Webflow AI Assistant | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Get in-context help and ideas while you build in Webflow with our new AI Assistant — quickly generate new sections, copy, and more.

articles.title: Control which sites your teammates, guests, and clients can access | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Site-specific access gives you an additional layer of security and simplicity when managing your web team across multiple sites in your Workspace.

articles.title: Updated controls in Webflow Optimize | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Re-launch AB tests and control your optimizations from either the reporting page or the canvas

articles.title: Component Localization Protection | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Preserve your pre-localized settings and content when working with components and Webflow Localization.

articles.title: Centralize feedback with commenting in the Designer | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Now Workspace members can share, review, and resolve feedback directly in the Webflow Designer without jumping between tools with comments.

articles.title: Publish individual CMS items | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Ever wanted to update or add a new CMS item without publishing your entire site (and potentially breaking in-progress design changes)? Well, now you can.

articles.title: "Symbols" evolved to "Components" | Webflow Updates
articles.description: We’ve introduced a handful of key improvements to Symbols and renamed them to Components to reflect their new power and set the stage for what’s to come.

articles.title: Manage variables at scale with reordering and bulk actions | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Organize your variables how you see fit—reorder, group, or delete your variables with drag and drop or bulk actions.

articles.title: Optimize based on locale | Webflow Updates
articles.description: Optimize now supports audience targeting and reporting based on locale.
